mobile.name: mage guildmaster
mobile.long_descr: Your guildmaster stands here.
mobile.description: An old man peering through ancient tomes rests here.
mobile.mob_flags: sentinel train practice mage nopurge gain

mobile.name: cleric guildmaster
mobile.long_descr: Your guildmaster stands here.
mobile.description: An older man wrapped in purple, long-flowing robes meditates here.
mobile.mob_flags: sentinel train practice cleric nopurge gain

mobile.name: warrior guildmaster
mobile.long_descr: Your guildmaster stands here.
mobile.description: A smaller man dressed in nothing but a tunic stands here waiting to train you.
mobile.mob_flags: sentinel train practice warrior nopurge gain
mobile.offense: area_attack bash disarm dodge fast kick parry

mobile.name: thief guildmaster
mobile.long_descr: Your guildmaster stands here.
mobile.description:
A small elf dressed in black rests in the corner. As you enter he grabs
a knife an throws it at you. It lands the wall next to your left ear. We
will now begin, is all he says.
mobile.mob_flags: sentinel train practice warrior nopurge gain
mobile.offense: backstab disarm dodge fast dirt_kick parry trip

mobile.name: receptionist
mobile.long_descr: A dark skinned, veiled woman greets you from behind the desk.
mobile.description:
This arabian beauty is obviously the daughter of some high ranking
official. As you attempt to sneak a peek under her veil you notice
a small moon-shaped birthmark on her left cheek.

mobile.name: bartender
mobile.long_descr: An old withered mage/bartender leans against the bar.
mobile.description: He looks distracted as he pours five drinks at once without error.
mobile.mob_flags: sentinel mage nopurge unused_act_7 indoors unused_act_8

mobile.name: john brother singer lead
mobile.long_descr: Brother John, lead singer for the Lokettes, stands on stage.
mobile.description: You see the lead singer of the Lokettes lip synching to an old Zeppelin tune.

mobile.name: panhandler
mobile.long_descr: A panhandler rests here.
mobile.description: A small skinny man rests here hoping to find a warm heart.

mobile.name: panhandler
mobile.long_descr: A panhandler rests here.
mobile.description: A small skinny man rests here staring at your clothes.

mobile.name: beggar
mobile.long_descr: A grubby beggar sits here in the filth.
mobile.description: This poor soul seems down on his luck, perhaps you might spare a dime?

mobile.name: baker
mobile.long_descr: The baker stands here playing solitaire.
mobile.description: You see a large man in a white apron covered in flour from head to toe.

mobile.name: shopkeeper
mobile.long_descr: The shopkeeper stands here.
mobile.description: You see a half-elf sitting on a stool behind his counter.

mobile.name: Nabil shopkeeper
mobile.long_descr: Nabil, purveyor of exotic pets, is waiting to serve you.
mobile.description:
A large, well-fed shopkeeper, Nabil is adept at finding animals from all 
parts of the world. He welcomes you warmly and offers to show you a pair
of priceless parrots.

mobile.name: ahkeem tailor
mobile.long_descr: Ahkeem the tailor welcomes you to his store.
mobile.description:
This middle-aged man looks over you with disdain and quickly suggests a new
wardrobe.

mobile.name: vera
mobile.long_descr: Vera the veggie lady beams as you look over her stand.
mobile.description: A tall slender elf stands before you smiling broadly.

mobile.name: butch
mobile.long_descr: Butch the meatcutter stands here in his bloodied apron.
mobile.description:
This stocky dwarf has a mad glint in his eye as he twirls his cleaver
carelessly into the air.
mobile.mob_flags: sentinel warrior nopurge unused_act_7 indoors unused_act_8

mobile.name: abdul armorer
mobile.long_descr: Abdul stands here, waiting to help you.
mobile.description:
Abdul returns your gaze with a steady eye. You quickly glance away under
his cold stare and place your order.
mobile.mob_flags: sentinel warrior nopurge unused_act_7 indoors unused_act_8

mobile.name: igor weaponsmith
mobile.long_descr: Igor stands here doing... something.
mobile.description: You see a small dwarf with a large hump on his left shoulder.
mobile.mob_flags: sentinel warrior nopurge unused_act_7 indoors unused_act_8

mobile.name: cassandra
mobile.long_descr: Cassandra stands proudly over her selection.
mobile.description:
You see a happy weather-worn face whose lines suggest many years on the
open sea. It is only through years of fishing that she is able to withstand
the smell that permeates the air.

mobile.name: foreman man
mobile.long_descr: The foreman stands here screaming at the workers.
mobile.description:
A worried working dwarf stands here constantly making notes in his
book and looking at his watch.

mobile.name: construction worker
mobile.long_descr: A construction worker steadily works here.
mobile.description: A large sweaty looking man doesn't even return your glance.

mobile.name: statue
mobile.long_descr: The statue of Nati stands here.

mobile.name: statue
mobile.long_descr: The statue of Alander stands here.
mobile.description:
Alander has been caught in the pose of casting a bolt of flame
down to some hapless victim.  He is dressed in the robes of a mage,
yet bears a sword carved into the glittering stone of his statue.

mobile.name: statue
mobile.long_descr: The statue of Zump stands here.
mobile.description: A statue of a stocky, angry looking dwarf with a cigarette in his mouth.

mobile.name: statue
mobile.long_descr: The statue of Nightshade stands here.
mobile.description:
A tall, swirling dark stone formed this statue.  As you peer at him
longer, it seems to chuckle.

mobile.name: statue
mobile.long_descr: The statue of Satin stands here.
mobile.description:
The statue of Satin, a small elven woman in mage robes, smiles serenely
and her eyes twinkle with gentle humour.  You take a step back in fear.

mobile.name: statue
mobile.long_descr: The statue of Shandra stands here.
mobile.description:
This statue poses the Lady of the Mountains in a simple robe, with
her long tresses sensibly pulled back from her smooth, smiling face.

mobile.name: statue
mobile.long_descr: There a statue of Furey standing here.
mobile.description: A statue of Furey.

mobile.name: statue
mobile.long_descr: The statue of Landru stands here.
mobile.description:
Landru is carved from shimmering polished hematite, and a smile seems
to flicker over his face.  A pair of dice are enclosed in one hand.
mobile.mob_flags: sentinel cleric mage warrior noalign outdoors unused_act_7

mobile.name: aziz
mobile.long_descr: Aziz the Human Canon stands here.
mobile.description: You see nothing special...

mobile.name: mustafah
mobile.long_descr: Mustafah the Human Robber stands here.
mobile.description: You see nothing special...
mobile.offense: backstab disarm dodge dirt_kick trip assist_vnum

mobile.name: fatima
mobile.long_descr: Fatima the Elven Invoker stands here.
mobile.description: You see nothing special...

mobile.name: kareem
mobile.long_descr: Kareem the Dwarven Mercenary stands here.
mobile.description: You see nothing special...
mobile.offense: bash berserk disarm kick parry rescue assist_vnum

mobile.name: nomad merchant
mobile.long_descr: A nomad merchant looks you over.
mobile.description:
This robust fellow returns your gaze with a smile, but something inside
tells you not to trust him very far.

mobile.name: bodyguard
mobile.long_descr: A bodyguard sizes you up.
mobile.description: The large half-orc quickly glances you over and returns to his duties.

mobile.name: kid thief
mobile.long_descr: A skinny kid wanders around.
mobile.description: This small child sees you looking at him and quickly looks away.
mobile.offense: backstab disarm dodge dirt_kick trip assist_vnum

mobile.name: dockworker
mobile.long_descr: A strong dockworker walks by moving crates.
mobile.description:
Although seemingly dull witted, this hulking mass carries the huge
crates from the boats like so many lilies.

mobile.name: man tax collector
mobile.long_descr: A small man walks around scribbling in a notebook.
mobile.description:
The city's tax collector walks from store to store collecting the
Sultan's fee for living in his grand city.

mobile.name: gord
mobile.long_descr: Gord the Rogue stands here.
mobile.description: You see nothing special.
mobile.offense: backstab disarm dodge dirt_kick trip assist_vnum

mobile.name: caramon
mobile.long_descr: Caramon the Knight stands here.
mobile.description: You see nothing special.
mobile.offense: bash berserk disarm kick parry rescue assist_vnum

mobile.name: raistlin
mobile.long_descr: Raistlin, the Arch-Magician stands here.
mobile.description: You see nothing special.

mobile.name: curley greenleaf
mobile.long_descr: Curley GreenLeaf stands here.
mobile.description: You see nothing special.

mobile.name: man wandering prophet
mobile.long_descr: A small grey-haired man walks around spouting gospel.
mobile.description:
This sad case may have been an evangelist in another lifetime. He is known
to stand on corners and accost passers-by with his doomsday preaching.

mobile.name: alley cat feline
mobile.long_descr: A small harmless feline searches for food.
mobile.description: You see a small starved cat.

mobile.name: vulture
mobile.long_descr: A vulture circles above you.
mobile.description: As you look up at this bird, you see the only thing it wants is a corpse.

mobile.name: old man
mobile.long_descr: An old man sits here playing chess.
mobile.description: He seems intent on winning.

mobile.name: conan librarian
mobile.long_descr: Conan the Librarian sits behind a desk.
mobile.description: The huge hulking mass rises as someone asks him a question.

mobile.name: dirt devil
mobile.long_descr: The wind kicks up some dust.
mobile.description: What you see before you is really a baby air elemental.

mobile.name: lamia
mobile.long_descr: A lamia stands here.
mobile.description: A half snake half woman creature rears back to attack you.

mobile.name: dervish
mobile.long_descr: A raggety dervish stands here.
mobile.description: This man looks like he could use a lot of rest.

mobile.name: sultan
mobile.long_descr: The Sultan rests here on his throne.
mobile.description: You see a large wealthy man in red robes smiling at you.

mobile.name: harem girl
mobile.long_descr: A lovely, veiled harem girl stands here.
mobile.description:
You see a dark skinned beauty, wearing almost transparent silks and 
light blue viel. Her loyalty to the sultan is unwavering.

mobile.name: jailer
mobile.long_descr: The Jailer sleeps here, snoring loudly.
mobile.description:
You see a pathetic soul lying here. Some ex-nobleman that has fallen
out of grace with the Sultan.

mobile.name: eunuch
mobile.long_descr: A eunuch stands here watching over the girls.
mobile.description:
You see a large man whose only duty is to protect the harem. He has been
castrated for the ladies' safety.

mobile.name: sultans favorite girl nichole
mobile.long_descr: Nichole, the sultan's favorite girl rests on a mound of pillows.
mobile.description:
You see the most beautiful arabian girl that has ever met your eyes. Too
bad she's about to kill you.

mobile.name: allah
mobile.long_descr: Allah is here.
mobile.description: You see the all-knowing Allah.
mobile.mob_flags: sentinel cleric mage warrior noalign outdoors unused_act_7

mobile.name: mage guildguard
mobile.long_descr: The Guard for the Guild of Mages stand here.
mobile.description: This man looks like a mage/warrior, i wouldn't mess with him.

mobile.name: cleric guildguard
mobile.long_descr: The Guard for the Guild of Clerics stands here.
mobile.description: This man looks like a cleric/warrior, I wouldn't mess with him.

mobile.name: warrior guildguard
mobile.long_descr: The Guard for the Guild of Warriors stands here.
mobile.description: The man looks like Conan's cousin, I wouldn't mess with him.

mobile.name: thief guildguard
mobile.long_descr: The Guard for the Guild of theives stands here.
mobile.description:
You see a thief dressed all in black, he quickly stands as you enter
and steps to bar your way. You notice his hands resting on two sheafs.

mobile.name: servant boy
mobile.long_descr: A servant boy is here running errands.
mobile.description: You see a small boy running around the halls of the palace.

mobile.name: sultans guard
mobile.long_descr: A guard stands here, protecting the innocent.
mobile.description: You see a trained fighter, ready to help those in need.
mobile.offense: bash berserk disarm kick parry rescue assist_vnum

mobile.name: sultans guard
mobile.long_descr: A guard stands here, watching the gate.
mobile.description: You see a trained fighter, ready to defend the city.
mobile.offense: bash berserk disarm kick parry rescue assist_vnum

mobile.name: sultans guard chief
mobile.long_descr: The chief of the sultan's guard stands here.
mobile.description: You see a large man skilled in hunting and killing.

mobile.name: mercenary
mobile.long_descr: A mercenary stands here waiting for a job.
mobile.description: You see an assassin down on his luck looking to be freelanced out.
mobile.offense: bash berserk disarm kick parry rescue assist_vnum

mobile.name: shipwright captain
mobile.long_descr: An old captain rests here carving on a stick.
mobile.description:
You see the shipwright of New Thalos, waiting to make someone a boat. He
beams a smile at you through his beard as you walk in.

mobile.name: blacksmith
mobile.long_descr: The blacksmith stands here pumping air into his fire.
mobile.description:
You see a large human, dripping in sweat, standing before you. He takes a
break from his swealtering work to bid you welcome.

mobile.name: horse
mobile.long_descr: A horse stands here.
mobile.description: You see one of the fine arabian beasts known about the land.

mobile.name: tourist
mobile.long_descr: A tourist stands here looking lost.
mobile.description:
You see a small round japanese man, with a camera around his neck and
a nose guard. He's looking at a small road map that he seems to be holding
upside down.

mobile.name: shelbye
mobile.long_descr: Shelbye stands here.
mobile.description: You see nothing special.

mobile.name: cryohydra
mobile.long_descr: The cryohydra stands here.
mobile.description: A grey-brown reptillian creature with amber eyes stands before you.

mobile.name: giant minotaur lizard
mobile.long_descr: The minotaur lizard stands here.
mobile.description: A huge lizard like reptile with horns like a minotaur.

mobile.name: dog death
mobile.long_descr: The death dog stands here.
mobile.description: A large two-headed hound barks at you viciously.

mobile.name: lion spotted
mobile.long_descr: The spotted lion stands here.
mobile.description: A large fierce dapple skinned lion glares at you.

mobile.name: behir
mobile.long_descr: A behir slithers on the ground.
mobile.description: You see a large snake like reptile with more than a dozen legs.

mobile.name: chimera
mobile.long_descr: A creature with three heads: lion, goat, and dragon stands here.
mobile.description:
The chimera is still a mystery, better left unexplored. This creature has
the hindquarters of a goat, the forepaws of a lion and the body of a red
dragon.

mobile.name: couatl
mobile.long_descr: A couatl hovers here.
mobile.description:
A beautiful creature with the body of a serpent and feathered wings the
color of the rainbow.

mobile.name: giant hornet
mobile.long_descr: The giant hornet hovers here.
mobile.description:
The giant hornet hits you very hard!
You wish you wounds would stop BLEEDING so much!

mobile.name: pegasus
mobile.long_descr: The pegasus stands here, flexing its wings.
mobile.description:
A magnificant winged steed, this horse looks much like the arabian
thoroughbred you've seen in the stables.

mobile.name: elvira
mobile.long_descr: Elvira stands here mixing a love potion.
mobile.description:
You see a very healthy female dressed in black, with long flowing
hair to match her outfit.
mobile.mob_flags: sentinel mage nopurge unused_act_7 indoors unused_act_8

mobile.name: braheem
mobile.long_descr: Braheem stands here talking to the walls.
mobile.description: You see a powerful but slighty insane mage.
mobile.mob_flags: sentinel mage nopurge unused_act_7 indoors unused_act_8

mobile.name: high priest
mobile.long_descr: The high priest rests here meditating, well he WAS meditating.
mobile.description: He does NOT look real happy that you have disturbed him.

mobile.name: royal guard elite
mobile.long_descr: An Elite Royal Guard stands here smiling happily.
mobile.description:
You see one of the Royal Guards from Midgaard who seems to have gone
through some training.
mobile.offense: bash berserk disarm kick parry rescue assist_vnum

mobile.name: patch bartender
mobile.long_descr: A large half-orc with a patch over one eye pours beer behind the counter
mobile.description:
You see a really big guy here who seems to have lost an eye in one manner
or another.
mobile.mob_flags: sentinel wimpy nopurge unused_act_7 indoors unused_act_8

mobile.name: stitch
mobile.long_descr: Stitch, the leather dude reclines in his chair.
mobile.description:
You see a small hobbit with his feet kicked up on his desk waiting for
some sucker, um, customer to walk in his store.
mobile.mob_flags: sentinel wimpy nopurge unused_act_7 indoors unused_act_8

mobile.name: gardener small elf
mobile.long_descr: A small elf stands here tending the garden.
mobile.description:
A young elf stands here in dirt covered overalls. He seems to be weeding
his garden.

mobile.name: nightmare demon horse
mobile.long_descr: A large horse, black as night, stands here.
mobile.description:
You see the largest horse you have ever seen before. Standing 10' at the
shoulder he breathes flame from his nostrils and leaps to protect
his love.

mobile.name: wolverine
mobile.long_descr: A large wolf like creature leaps out from the darkness.
mobile.description:
You see a half wolf- half human beast wearing a glove with long thin
blades on it.

mobile.name: mimic painting
mobile.long_descr: You see an incredibly life-like painting of the Sultan's mother.
mobile.description: Boy is she ugly.

mobile.name: mayor
mobile.long_descr: The Mayor of New Thalos stands here.
mobile.description: You see a chubby hobbit dressed in his best suit.

mobile.name: chef
mobile.long_descr: The chef stands here making dinner.
mobile.description: You see a very large human who seems to taste everything he makes.

mobile.name: ixitxachitl
mobile.long_descr: A very large ray with a wicked looking tail swims here.
mobile.description: You see a large ray with sharp fangs and a barbed tail.

mobile.name: guard bodyguard
mobile.long_descr: A bodyguard stands here.
mobile.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.
mobile.offense: bash berserk disarm kick parry rescue assist_vnum
